instruction: This task is about translating a given Yoruba language sentence to English.

output: It is the fool that wears the Nupe masquerade; it is the wise person that collects the monetary gifts.

instruction: This task is about translating a given Yoruba language sentence to English.
input: Ní September 10, 2019, ilé ẹjọ́ ìlú Khujand ní Tajikistan fi Arákùnrin Shamil Khakimov sí ẹ̀wọ̀n ọdún méje àtààbọ̀ kìkì nítorí pé ó ń sọ ohun tó gbà gbọ́ fún àwọn míì.
output: On September 10, 2019, the Khujand City Court in Tajikistan sentenced Brother Shamil Khakimov to seven and a half years in prison for merely sharing his religious beliefs with others.

instruction: This task is about translating a given Yoruba language sentence to English.
input: "Ní Tuesday, September 4, 2018, ìjì líle kan jà ní ìwọ̀ oòrùn orílẹ̀-èdè Japan, ó ti lé lógún ọdún tírú ẹ̀ ti jà kẹ́yìn nílẹ̀ náà.
output: "On Tuesday, September 4, 2018, western Japan suffered the effects of what is being reported as the most powerful typhoon to hit the country in over two decades.

instruction: This task is about translating a given Yoruba language sentence to English.
input: Ó tún jẹ́ ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ òsèlú ruling African Party of Independence of Guinea àti Cape Verde (PAIGC)  lásìkò tí ó dá ẹgbẹ́ Movement for Democratic Alternative (MADEM-G15), sílẹ̀, ní èyí tí ó fí díje fún ipò ààrẹ, tí ó sì jáwé olúborí.
output: He was a member of the ruling African Party of Independence of Guinea and Cape Verde (PAIGC) when he founded the Movement for Democratic Alternative (MADEM-G15) on which platform he won the elections.

instruction: This task is about translating a given Yoruba language sentence to English.

instruction: This task is about translating a given Yoruba language sentence to English.
